description.@en: I’ve learned to read people and know when to act treacherously, catching them unaware.

data.notes:
Lawbreaker Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically oath breakers or on the run from something or someone. They deal in lies, steal from the unwary and rabble-rouse to earn their keep, and with nothing to lose, they have little to fear.

effect.@en: Whenever you deal Damage against a foe for the first time, add a 1D6 Fury Die to Total Damage. You can take advantage of this in combat by switching between multiple foes.
